actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to treat as employees, for purposes of withholding and social security taxes, certain fishermen who comprise the operating crew of a boat if the operating crew normally consists of more than 5 individuals.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code and the Social Security Act to treat as employees, for purposes of withholding and social security taxes, certain fishermen who comprise the operating crew of a boat if the operating crew normally consists of more than five individuals. (Currently such requirement pertains to more than nine individuals.)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to treat as employees, for purposes of withholding and social security taxes, certain fishermen who comprise the operating crew of a boat if the operating crew normally consists of more than 5 individuals.
